library(htmltools)

```{r styling, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Add some custom CSS styling to the cards
tags$style("
  /* Style the card container */
  .card {
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 0px;
    max-width: 100%;
    max-height:auto;
    margin: auto;
    text-align: center;
    font-family: arial;
    border-radius: 10px;
    overflow: hidden;
    border-top: 2px solid rgba(0,255,0, 0.5);
  }

  /* Style the card header */
  .card-header {
    padding: 10px;
    background-color: inherit;
    color: inverse;
    text-align: center;
    font-family: arial;
    font-size: 30px;
    font-weight: bold;
    border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(0,255,0, 0.8);
  }

  /* Style the card image */
  .card-image {
    width: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    border-radius: 10px;
  }

  /* Style the card text */
  .card-text {
    color: grey90;
    font-size: 30px;
  }
  
  /* Style button*/
  button {
    outline: 0;
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 8px;
    text-align: center;
    cursor: pointer;
    max-width: 60%;
    font-size: 30px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    border: 2px solid rgba(0,255,0, 0.8);
    url: https://chat.whatsapp.com/D6QKPzWip0HGCPf8P3Z5Yb;
    margin-left: 20%;
    margin-right: 20%;
  }
  
  /* Container holding the image and the text */
  .container {
    position: relative;
    text-align: center;
    color: inherit;
    object-fit: fill;
    max-width: 100%;
    max-height:auto;
    margin: auto;
  }

  /* Top left text */
  .top-left {
    position: relative;
    max-top: 100px;
    max-left: 205px;
    max-right: 200px;
    min-bottom: 100px;
    color: grey90;
    font-size: 30px;
    background-color: inherit;
    opacity: 0.8;
    border-radius: 10px;
  }
")
```

```{r landingpage, echo=FALSE}
# Create a list of HTML tags for the cards
card(
  card_header(
    class = "card-header",
    htmltools::tags$div(
      "Canary ToursKE",
      style = "color:brown;"
    )
  ),
  
  card_body(
    # Add an img tag for the card image
    htmltools::tags$img(
      src = "/pages/images/image4.jpg",
      class = "card-image",
    )),
    
    card_body(
      # Add a div tag for the card text
      htmltools::tags$div(
        class = "card-text",
        "Find places where your dollars go the farthest and tips to create amazing travel experiences without breaking the bank. Travel more and spend less!"
      )),
    
  card_body(
      htmltools::tags$button(
        class = "button",
        htmltools::tags$a(
          href = "https://chat.whatsapp.com/D6QKPzWip0HGCPf8P3Z5Yb",
          "Contact Us",
          
          style = "color: brown;"
        )
      )
  )
)
```

```{r mission, echo=FALSE}
# Create a vector of card texts
texts <- c(
  "Turning every moment into a lifetime memory"
)

# Create a list of HTML tags for the cards
card(
  card_body(
    htmltools::tags$p(
      "Our Mission",
      class = "title",
      style = "font-weight: bold;"
    )
  ),
  
  card_body(
    # Add an img tag for the card image
    htmltools::tags$p(
      texts,
      class = "title"
    ))
)
```
